article_title: [WATCH] Bill Maher Tells Liberals To Stop Fighting Each Other
article_text:
After nicking Sen. Ted Cruz who signed up for Obamacare, and grilling Gov. Mike Huckabee on his Christian persecution complex, HBO Real Time host Bill Maher scolded liberals for their internecine. “What is the point of attacking people who are 95 percent on your side?” he wondered.

“How deeply stupid has the far left become when gay designers can’t get along with gay musicians, when vegans attack vegetarians for not being pure enough…I see agnostics and atheists bitching at each other . Why is this even a thing? Do you believe in a talking snake? Me neither – we’re on the same team!

twitter.title: Bill Maher To PC Liberals: “Shut Up”
